author: andschwa
body:
We need to make OMI a submodule of PSRP with the features branch and migrate the documentation over, then remove the submodules from this repository and update all the building documentation to just use `git clone --recursive`.

At the same time, we should fork OMI into the PowerShell organization so that we can do #454.
title: Remove OMI and PSRP provider from PowerShell
